column2: "Mma nnhu wo nua ne nantwi anaa no guan dɛ ɔatɔ gon
column3: na mmfi hɔn ho nnkosuma: fa hɔn san brɛ wo nua."

column2: "Na sɛ wo nua no mmbɛn wo
column3: anaa sɛ innyim no a
column4: ɔno fa no bra wo fie wo
column5: na ɔnko wo nkyɛn nkodu dɛ wo nua no bɔhwehwɛ no
column6: na aadan no ama no bio."

column2: "Na dɛmara so na fa yɛ n’asoaso; anaa wo nua n’adze biara a ayew no a ehu no: mma nnguan mmfi ho."
"Mma nnhu wo nua n’asoaso anaa ne nantwi dɛ ɔahwe ase wɔ ɔkwan mu
column3: na mmfi ho nnkosuma: boa no ma ɔmma hɔn do bio."

column2: "Mma ɔbaa nnhyɛ adze a ɔyɛ ɔbanyin dze
column3: nkyii so ɔbanyin nnhyɛ ɔbaa n’atar: na obiara a ɔyɛ iyinom no ɔyɛ ekyiwadze ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Sɛ ikopue anoma ne birebuw bi do awerɛfir mu wɔ ɔkwan mu
column3: wɔ dua biara do anaa famu
column5: na na no butuw na mba no
column7: mma nnkyer na no nnka mba no ho;"

column2: "ɔno ma na no nkɔ
column3: na fa mba no; na eesi wo yie

column2: "Sɛ isi dan fofor a
column3: ɔno gye wo dan etsifi ban
column4: ama sɛ obi fi do hwe ase a
column5: aammfa bɔgya ammba wo dan no do."

column2: "Mma mmfa aba horow ebien nndua wo wenyin ture mu: amma aannhwer nduadzewa no nyina
column3: aba a edua no
column4: nye wenyin ture no ndɔbaa no nyina."

column2: "Mma mmfa ɔnantwi nye asoaso mmbɔ mu mmfuntum."
"Mma mmfura tam a wɔdze kuntu nye ndwera afora awen."
"Tu wo tam a edze kata wo do no ntoado anan no do ndwow."
"Sɛ ɔbanyin bi hyia yer
column3: na ɔkɔ ne nkyɛn
column11: mennhu no ho mbaabunyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze no a:"

column2: "ɔno akataasia no n’egya nye ne na mfa akataasia no ne mbaabunyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze no na wɔmfa mbra kurow no mu mpanyimfo nkyɛn wɔ kuropon no mu;"
"na akataasia no n’egya nse mpanyimfo no dɛ
column3: Medze me babaa maa ɔbanyin yi awar

column2: "na
column3: hwɛ
column6: Mennhu mbaabunyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze wɔ wo babaa yi ho; naaso me babaa ne mbaabunyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze nye yi. Na wɔntserɛw tam no mu wɔ kurow no mu mpanyimfo no enyim."

column2: "Na kurow no mu mpanyimfo no mfa ɔbanyin no na wɔntwe n’aso;"
"na wɔngye no mbratodze dwetɛ ɔha
column3: na wɔmfa mma akataasia no n’egya
column4: osiandɛ ɔabɔ Israel ɔbaabun dzin bɔn: na nwar no; mma ɔnnko no wɔ ne nda nyinara mu."

column2: "Na sɛ asɛm yi yɛ nokwar
column3: dɛ woennhu mbaabunyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze wɔ akataasia no ho dze a:"

column2: "ɔno wonyi akataasia no mbra n’egya ne fi abowano
column3: na no kurow no mu mbanyin nsiw no abo ma onwu: osiandɛ ɔayɛ nkwaseadze wɔ Israel
column4: dɛ ɔagor ndwamangor wɔ n’egya fie: ama eeyi mbusu no efi wo mu."

column2: "Sɛ wohu ɔbanyin bi dɛ ɔnye ɔbaa a ɔwɔ kun da a
column3: ɔno hɔn beenu nyina nwu
column4: ɔbanyin a ɔnye ɔbaa no dae no
column5: nye ɔbaa no: ama eeyi mbusu no efi Israel."

column2: "Sɛ wɔdze akataasia bi a ɔyɛ ɔbaabun ma banyin bi awar
column3: na banyin bi hu no wɔ kurow mu

column2: "ɔno hom mfa hɔn emu ebien nyina mfir edzi nkɔ kurow no n’abotsen ekyir
column3: na hom nsiw hɔn abo ma wonwuwu; akataasia no
column4: dɛ ɔwɔ kurow mu na ɔannkeka mu ntsi; na ɔbanyin no
column5: dɛ ɔabrɛ ne nyɛnko ne yer adze ntsi: ama eeyi mbusu no efi wo mu."

column2: "Na sɛ banyin bi hu akataasia ɔwarfo bi yer no wɔ haban mu
column3: na ɔbanyin no kyer no
column4: na ɔnye no da a; ɔno ɔbanyin a ɔnye no dae no nko na onwu:"

column2: "na akataasia no dze mma nnyɛ no hwee; bɔn a ɔsɛ owu nnyi akataasia no do: na dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa soɛr ne nyɛnko do
column3: na oku no no
column4: dɛmara so na asɛm yi tse:"

column2: "na haban mu na ohun no; na akataasia a wɔagye no yer no kekaa mu
column3: na nna obi nnyi hɔ a ɔbɛgye no."

column2: "Sɛ banyin bi hu akataasia a ɔyɛ ɔbaabun a wɔnngyee no yer
column3: na ɔkyer no

column2: "ɔno banyin a ɔnye no dae no
column3: mfa dwetɛ  dwetɛbona   eduonum mma akataasia no n’egya
column5: osiandɛ ɔabrɛ no adze; mma ɔnnko no ne nda nyinara."

column2: "Ɔbanyin bi nnwar n’egya ne yer
column3: na onnyi n’egya n’akatado."
